ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Geforce and SBLive! questions for p3 800 system
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Graphical glitches like this are usually caused by a driver problem (either the video drivers or DirectX), or rarely by a hardware problem (usually an
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Apr 2000, Tom Henschel wrote:
>
> sitting). I do get flashes of lines or boxes on the screen. Even just
> standing with no songs going. The game plays ok with these flashes (if you
> call that ok). I have changed all the resolutions in the game control box,

Graphical glitches like this are usually caused by a driver
problem (either the video drivers or DirectX), or rarely by a
hardware problem (usually an overclocked/overstressed video
card or CPU, or a badly designed card like the Riva128).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
